DOC.brief_summary: This single-center , randomize , single-blind ( evaluator ) study . Enrolled patient traumatic meniscal tear underwent meniscectomy . The study include 6 week ( 12 visit ) standard quadriceps intensive rehabilitation . The objective study determine effect quadriceps intensive rehabilitation knee function articular cartilage .
DOC.criteria: 1. traumatic onset meniscal tear ( i.e . specific mechanism injury ) 2. meniscectomy surgery perform within 12 month index injury 3. meniscal tear confirm time surgery 4. subject anticipate live close proximity Gainesville one year follow surgery . 1. bilateral injury 2. concomitant ligamentous injury 3. previous knee injury 4. articular cartilage defect > Grade II Outerbridge scale 5. patellofemoral joint pain > 3/10 activity 6. low limb alignment > 5 degree valgus varus 7. contraindication MR examination include : pacemaker , metal implant MR compatible , pregnancy severe claustrophobia .
